    • Uses of User in org.syntaxes.fortress

      Fields in org.syntaxes.fortress with type parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<User> ChatHandler.userList
      Contains a list of all the "User"s connected.
      Methods in org.syntaxes.fortress with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void ChatHandler.addUser(java.net.Socket userSocket, User user, java.lang.String nickname)
      Adds a user to the User list and sends a message to everyone on as well as console.
      static void ChatHandler.chat(java.lang.String input, User sender)
      Handles chat, and if the chat message starts with a '.', it sends it to CommandHandler.class
      static void CommandHandler.list(User sender)
      Lists all connected users back to whoever requested (Work in progress).
      static void ChatHandler.removeUser(User user)
      Removes a user from the list and announces that they disconnected.
      static void CommandHandler.say(java.lang.String[] args, User sender)
      Sends a message to all users in the format: [Server] Mesage.
      static void ChatHandler.sendRaw(java.lang.String toSend, User sendTo)
      Sends a message to a certain user on the chat room.
